name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TM client for ASUS Product Sheets

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The TM client is a helpful tool for translating content on the ASUS website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Purpose:
This tool is specifically crafted to aid translators in the translation of Product Sheets on the ASUS website.

How It Works:
When a translator presses the <Shift> key, the tool instantly provides translations for the string under the mouse cursor.
The translator can easily to replace the selected string with the provided translation.

Data Retrieval:
The tool seamlessly retrieves data from previously translated pages on the website and databases created with the Translation Manager (TM) tool.
